mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL ORDER BY B.ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , EMAIL , VIEW_CNT , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , IP) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL , #{subject} , #{content} , #{email} , 0 , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{fileName} , #{originFileName} , #{ip})
mapper.select: SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE B.ID = #{_parameter}
